SEARCH
Package managers

Class DoctorManager

java.lang.Object
managers.UserManager
managers.DoctorManager
public class DoctorManager extends UserManager
The DoctorManager class is responsible for managing doctor records and their associated patients. It extends the UserManager class to provide specific functionality for creating and managing doctors and their patient records. This class provides methods for creating doctor users, generating records from doctor objects, and updating patient-related information.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public User createUser(String id)
      Creates a Doctor user from the given ID. The method retrieves the doctor's data, including associated patients, and returns a populated Doctor object.
      Specified by:
      createUser in class UserManager
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the doctor.
      Returns:
      The Doctor object with populated data, including a list of associated patients.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the doctor ID does not exist.

    • createRecordFromUser

      public String[] createRecordFromUser(User user)
      Generates a record array from the provided Doctor object. The array represents the doctor's ID, name, and a list of associated patient IDs.
      Specified by:
      createRecordFromUser in class UserManager
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to convert into a record.
      Returns:
      A string array representing the doctor's record
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided user is not a Doctor.

    • updatePatientDiagnoses

      public void updatePatientDiagnoses(Doctor doctor, String patientID, List<String> newDiagnoses)
      Updates the diagnoses for a specific patient associated with the given doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor who is updating the patient's diagnoses.
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      newDiagnoses - A list of new diagnoses for the patient.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the patient ID is not associated with the doctor

    • addPatientByID

      public void addPatientByID(Doctor doctor, String patientId)
      Adds a patient to a doctor's list of patients using the patient's ID. The method creates a new `Patient` object using the provided patient ID, then adds the patient to the specified doctor's patient list. After adding the patient, it updates the doctor's record in the user file.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The `Doctor` object to which the patient will be added.
      patientId - The ID of the patient to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the patientId is invalid or if there is an error during file updates.
